comment: Distributive property for extended real addition and multiplication. Like ~ xaddass , this has an unusual domain of correctness due to counterexamples like ` ( +oo x. ( 2 - 1 ) ) = -oo =/= ` ` ( ( +oo x. 2 ) - ( +oo x. 1 ) ) = ( +oo - +oo ) = 0 ` . In this theorem we show that if the multiplier is real then everything works as expected.
